price: 他们只因安拉的意欲而记忆它。他是应受敬畏的，他是宜于赦宥的。
arabic: وَمَا يَذۡكُرُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ هُوَ أَهۡلُ ٱلتَّقۡوَىٰ وَأَهۡلُ ٱلۡمَغۡفِرَةِ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: wamā yadhkurūna illā an yashāa al-lahu huwa ahlu al-taqwā wa-ahlu al-maghfirati
